channel.title: Need Help With Running The Client
channel.description:
Okay guys so whenever i run my run.bat file on the source its fine but when i go on the client run.bat it shows the .jar file then a message pops up saying: [code]Please Screenshot this message and send it to an Owner!
java.io.FileNotFoundException "http://rs-virtue.net/cacheVersion.txt sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknow Source) java.net.URL.openStream(Unknown Source) UpdateCache.egtNewestVersion(UpdateCache.java:34) UpdateCache.run(RSApplet.java:33) client.run(client.java:5112) java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
and in the cmd for the source side side it shows this : [code]va:579) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.ja va:221) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at server.util.MadTurnipConnection.createConnection(MadT urnipConnection.java:19) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at server.util.MadTurnipConnection.run(MadTurnipConnecti on.java:40) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: Caused by: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsExce ption: Communications link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 1,371,568,508,563 mill iseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 millisecond s ago. [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at sun.reflect.GeneratedConstructorAccessor2.newInstance (Unknown Source) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInst ance(DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.java:45) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor .java:525) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.Util.handleNewInstance(Util.java:406) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createCommunicationsException (SQLError.java:1074) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:341) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.createNewIO(ConnectionI mpl.java:2137) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: ... 12 more [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: Caused by: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: con nect [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.connect0(Native Met hod) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(DualS tackPlainSocketImpl.java:69) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(AbstractPl ainSocketImpl.java:339) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Abs tractPlainSocketImpl.java:200) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(AbstractPlai nSocketImpl.java:182) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(PlainSocketImpl.java :157) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(SocksSocketImpl.java :391) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:579) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:528) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at java.net.Socket.<init>(Socket.java:425) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at java.net.Socket.<init>(Socket.java:241) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(Standard SocketFactory.java:253) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:290) [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: ... 13 more [6/18/13 8:15 AM]: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Comm unications link failure

item.title: Need Help With Running The Client

item.description:
@yo_its_jake wrote:

Okay guys so whenever i run my run.bat file on the source its fine but when i go on the client run.bat it shows the .jar file then a message pops up saying:
